item.title: Prosecutor says stalking suspect ambushed Pennsylvania police officers, killing 3
item.description: A prosecutor says a suspected stalker armed with a rifle hid inside his ex-girlfriendâ€™s home in Pennsylvania and ambushed police officers who came to arrest him, killing three of them.
